```{r}

library(tidyverse)

data <- read.csv("onedrive-imports/key_adni_tables_merged.csv" )

both <- data[which( !is.na(data$PIB)),]

RIDs<-both$RID

PTIDs<-both$PTID

sorted <- sort(PTIDs_uniq)
```

```{r}

PET_PTID <- read.csv("data/ADNI1_PET_PTIDs.csv", header=FALSE)

MR_PTID <- read.csv("data/ADNI1_MR_PTIDs.csv", header=FALSE)

PET_RID <- read.csv("data/ADNI1_PET_RIDs.csv", header=FALSE)

MR_RID <- read.csv("data/ADNI1_MR_RIDs.csv", header=FALSE)

View(PET_PTID)
View(MR_PTID)

View(PET_RID)
View(MR_RID)

names(PET_RID)
names(MR_RID)

intersect(PET_RID$V1, MR_RID$V1)

test <- PET_RID$V1 %in%  MR_RID$V1

sum(test, na.rm = TRUE) #0
```
